0:
--------------------
Text: The Birgu Clock Tower (Maltese: "It-Torri tal-Arloġġ tal-Birgu" ), also called the "Vittoriosa Clock Tower" and originally the Civic Clock Tower, was a clock tower in Birgu, Malta.
Triplets:<The Birgu Clock Tower
1:
--------------------
Text: Birgu Clock Tower:  It was located in Victory Square, the city's main square, and it was a prominent landmark in Birgu and the rest of the Three Cities.
Triplets:<Birgu Clock Tower
2:
--------------------
<Text: Birgu Clock Tower:  The tower was probably built in the Middle Ages, although some sources state that it was constructed in 1549.>
Triplets:<Birgu Clock Tower
3:
--------------------
Text: Birgu Clock Tower:  It served as a watchtower since it had views over the Grand Harbour and the surrounding countryside, and it saw use during the Great Siege of Malta in 1565.
Triplets:<Birgu Clock Tower
